maml:description.maml:para: Adds a module to be autoloaded when OMP starts up.
Adds a module to be autoloaded when OMP starts up.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds posh-git to the list of modules that will be loaded with OhMyPsh for this user.

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a function to be autoloaded into your session when OMP starts up.
Adds a function to be autoloaded into your session when OMP starts up.

maml:Description.maml:para: Add every script in the directory.
Add every script in the directory.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds 'C:\users\jdoe\scripts\myscript.ps1' to the list of functions that will be loaded with OhMyPsh for this user.

maml:description.maml:para: Dot sources a plugin
Dot sources a plugin and enables it for your profile.

maml:Description.maml:para: If the plugin is already loaded use this to force load it again.

Force an update of the plugin configuration. If a config scriptblock is passed then that will be used as the update. Otherwise if a config scriptblock is found in the plugin that will be used instead. This is an advanced parameter that should rarely need to be used.
Show some additional output for debugging purposes.
The plugin to add to your profile and optionally load.
If the plugin is already loaded use this to force load it again.

Force an update of the plugin configuration. If a config scriptblock is passed then that will be used as the update. Otherwise if a config scriptblock is found in the plugin that will be used instead. This is an advanced parameter that should rarely need to be used.
Show some additional output for debugging purposes.
The plugin to add to your profile and optionally load.

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a new setting to the user profile settings if they do not already exist. Afterwards the profile is automatically exported and saved.
Adds a new setting to the user profile settings if they do not already exist. Afterwards the profile is automatically exported and saved.
Saves the current OhMyPsh profile.
Saves the current OhMyPsh profile.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path to the user module profile settings.
Path to the user module profile settings.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Saves the profile settings to C:\temp\.OhMyPsh.profile.json into the module settings

maml:description.maml:para: Returns the git branch based on the current directory.
Returns the git branch based on the current directory.
Returns the git branch based on the current directory.
Returns the git branch based on the current directory.
Returns the console host initial state when OhMyPsh is loaded.
Returns the console host initial state when OhMyPsh is loaded.
Platform independant retrieval of the current primary IP address.
Platform independant retrieval of the current primary IP address.
Shows OhMyPsh sourced functions that have been loaded to this session.
Shows OhMyPsh sourced functions that have been loaded to this session.

maml:Description.maml:para: The function name. If nothing is passed all sourced functions are listed.
The function name. If nothing is passed all sourced functions are listed.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows all OhMyPsh plugin functions that have been exported to this session.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieve the current OS platform.
Retrieve the current OS platform.

maml:Description.maml:para: Get further details about the possible linux distribution in use.
Get further details about the possible linux distribution in use.

maml:description.maml:para: Shows plugins and their load state.
Shows plugins and their load state.

maml:Description.maml:para: The plugin name. If nothing is passed all plugins are listed.
The plugin name. If nothing is passed all plugins are listed.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows all OhMyPsh plugins and if they are loaded or not.
Shows all the plugin properties of the qod plugin.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves the current session PowerShell profile.
Retrieves the current session PowerShell profile.

maml:Description.maml:para: The type of profile to show the contents of.
The type of profile to show the contents of.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves all Powershell profiles for the exisisting session, if they exist, and the order of operation they are processed.
Retrieves all Powershell profiles for the exisisting session, if they exist, and the order of operation they are processed.
Retrieve the current OhMyPsh profile path.
Retrieve the current OhMyPsh profile path.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows the current profile path.

maml:description.maml:para: Get one or all of the OMP settings.
Get one or all of the OMP settings.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows the value of SomeSetting

maml:description.maml:para: Display the Prompt color settings.
Display the Prompt color settings.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows the Prompt color settings

maml:description.maml:para: Returns the current OhMyPsh state.
Returns the current OhMyPsh state. Includes the detected OS platform and other information discovered at load time.
Retreive platform independant uptime informaton (should run on both linux and windows properly).
Retreive platform independant uptime informaton (should run on both linux and windows properly).

maml:Description.maml:para: For windows you can retrieve the time that the system has been up since it last was in sleep mode. Uses event log entries to determine and can be time consuming.
For windows you can retrieve the time that the system has been up since it last was in sleep mode. Uses event log entries to determine and can be time consuming.

maml:description.maml:para: Shows themes and their load state.
Shows themes and their load state.

maml:Description.maml:para: The theme name. If nothing is passed all themes are listed.
The theme name. If nothing is passed all themes are listed.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Shows all OhMyPsh themes and if it is loaded or not.

maml:description.maml:para: Attempt to load and optionally install a powershell module.
Attempt to load and optionally install a powershell module. By default all installed modules are scoped to the current user.

dev:remarks.maml:para: If not already imported attempt to import posh-git. If the OhMyPsh profile allows, attempt to automatically install posh-git if it isn't found.

maml:description.maml:para: Loads a user profile.
Loads a user profile.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path to the user module profile settings.
Path to the user module profile settings.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Loads the profile from C:\temp\.OhMyPsh.profile.json into the module settings

maml:description.maml:para: Runs the shutdown code for a loaded plugin.
Runs the shutdown code for a loaded plugin.
Creates a new OMP Plugin template.
Creates a new OMP Plugin template.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path of the plugin. The default path is the plugin folder in the module directory.
Path of the plugin. The default path is the plugin folder in the module directory.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates 'mygreatplugin' in the plugins directory and displays the full path to the created plugin.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new OMP Plugin manifest file.
Creates a new OMP Plugin manifest file.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path of the manifest file. The default path is the plugin folder in the module directory.
Version of the plugin. Defaults to 0.0.1.
Plugin description for the manifest file.
Path of the manifest file. The default path is the plugin folder in the module directory.
Version of the plugin. Defaults to 0.0.1.
Plugin description for the manifest file.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates 'mygreatplugin' manifest file in the mygreatplugin directory of the current and displays the full path to the created plugin.

maml:description.maml:para: Runs ngen on powershell assemblies. This can sometimes optimize startup times for PowerShell.
Runs ngen on powershell assemblies. This can sometimes optimize startup times for PowerShell. Requires an elevated prompt to run.
Removes a module to be autoloaded when OMP starts up.
Removes a module to be autoloaded when OMP starts up.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes posh-git from the list of modules that will be loaded when OhMyPsh starts.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a module from this session.
Removes a module from this session.

maml:Description.maml:para: If you are removing the module as part of a plugin use this switch to unload a module only if it is not in the autoloaded modules. This will also only unload a module if it was loaded in this session (Loaded prior to OhMyPsh being started). Note that this is not 'safe' if there are multiple plugins loaded with the same module requirements.

If you are removing the module as part of a plugin use this switch to unload a module only if it is not in the autoloaded modules. This will also only unload a module if it was loaded in this session (Loaded prior to OhMyPsh being started). Note that this is not 'safe' if there are multiple plugins loaded with the same module requirements.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes posh-git from this session if it was not autoloaded or loaded when OhMyPsh started.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a loaded personal function path from the profile.
Removes a loaded personal function path from the profile.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes posh-git from the list of modules that will be loaded when OhMyPsh starts.

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a loaded plugin
Removes a loaded plugin

maml:Description.maml:para: Attempt to remove a plugin that doesn't show as being loaded
Attempt to remove a plugin that doesn't show as being loaded

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a custom profile setting that is not one of the core settings. Afterwards the profile is automatically exported and saved.
Removes a custom profile setting that is not one of the core settings. Afterwards the profile is automatically exported and saved.
Resets various registry setting overrides for default console color values.
Resets various registry setting overrides for default console color values. This can be useful if console theming on windows just doesn't seem to work the way you would expect. Use at your own risk!
Restores the original console colors.
Restores the original console colors.
Restores the original powershell prompt function.
Restores the original powershell prompt function.
Restores the original console colors and title.
Restores the original console colors and title.
Restores original aliases that are backed up when this module initially loads.
Restores original aliases that are backed up when this module initially loads.
Restores the original powershell PSDefaultParameters variable.
Restores the original powershell PSDefaultParameters variable.
Restores the original powershell TabCompletion and TabCompletion2 functions.
Restores the original powershell TabCompletion and TabCompletion2 functions.
Restores the original PSReadline colors and settings.
Restores the original PSReadline colors and settings.
Sets different console colors.
Sets different console colors. PSReadline will almost always overwrite this if it is loaded.
Sets the default git output module. This can be used to flip between posh-git and psgit modules.

Sets the default git output module. This can be used to flip between posh-git and psgit modules. This is important for customized prompt output as well as in general for managing git repos on your system. The default is just to use some basic scripts with this module. Otherwise this can be posh-git or psgit (named so after the modules that get loaded). Write-OMPGitStatus uses this setting directly to determine how to spit out VCS information to the prompt.

maml:Description.maml:para: Name of the git output module to use. psgit, posh-git, or script. Default is script and no modules are used for writing version control to the prompt.
Name of the git output module to use. psgit, posh-git, or script. Default is script and no modules are used for writing version control to the prompt.

maml:description.maml:para: Set one of the OMP settings.
Set one of the OMP settings.

maml:Description.maml:para: The setting to update the value of.
The setting to update the value of.

maml:description.maml:para: Sets the theme.
Sets the theme.

maml:Description.maml:para: Will not save the theme in the profile if there are any errors.
The theme to load. Will be applied immediately
Will not save the theme in the profile if there are any errors.
The theme to load. Will be applied immediately

Sets the Host window title.

Shows OhMyPsh basic help.

Shows OhMyPsh basic status information.
